page.title: 16WHALTON CHURCH
page.content: The 13th century Anglican Church of{ {St. Mary Magdalene, Whalton}is the only religous meeting place within this survey block.The parish has recently been extended to include the churches at Bolam,Hartburn,Meldon and Netherwitton. Whalton Church is served by 3 churchwardens,a solicitor and 2 retired farmers. There are 30-40 names on the Electoral Roll with an average weekly attendence of about 20. A "Quota" of Â£2,000 has to be raised annually by direct giving and fund raising. Whalton's part in the overall pattern of services for the enlarged parish takes place at 9.45am with Prayer Book Holy Communion alternating with Mattins. A monthly Saturday School is held in the Rectory for children aged between 5_10 years. The attendence is normally around 12. Whalton Mother's Union has 20 members.
